function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unavailability of the exact number of COVID-19 positive patients","Impact":"Inaccurate calculation of case-fatality rate and difficulty in drawing solid conclusions","Mitigation":"Urgent need to collect more data for further studies","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools","People":"Long-term liver transplant recipients with metabolic comorbidities","Owner":"Healthcare professionals, researchers"},{"Description":"Immunosuppression in asymptomatic liver transplant recipients","Impact":"Potential for increased susceptibility to SARS-CoV-2 and other contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Avoid reduction or stoppage of immunosuppression in asymptomatic liver transplant recipients","Technologies":"Medical monitoring and management tools","People":"Asymptomatic liver transplant recipients","Owner":"Healthcare professionals, transplant specialists"}]}
